message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. Is this a price you're comfortable with?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  That's a little steep for me though. Would you consider $80?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer you the product for $110. Is this a price you'd be willing to pay?
I appreciate you coming down, Alice.  How about $90?  That's a fair offer.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $92. Is this a price you'd be willing to pay?
Alice, you drive a hard bargain!  I'll meet you at $91, that's my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm not willing to go any lower than $92. If you're serious about the product, this is my final offer. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.
